#Text=British pilot dies in plane crash ; nine passengers survive
#Text=Sunday , October 25 , 2009
#Text=A British pilot has died in a plane crash in the Caribbean Sea but managed to help save the lives of the nine passengers on the plane .
#Text=Robert Mansell , aged 32 , was a pilot who lived in the village of Knowle in the West Midlands of England .
#Text=He had previously worked with Windward Islands Airways but was flying planes for Divi Divi Air at the time of his death .

#Text=At 0930 local time , Mansell was flying with his nine passengers between the Caribbean islands of Curaçao and Bonaire when the right engine of his Britten-Norman Islander light aircraft failed .
#Text=At this time the height above sea level was roughly 3,500 feet .
#Text=The pilot made a mayday call .
#Text=It has emerged that the last words that he said on the transmission were : " I ’ve lost control of one of my engines…so long . "
#Text=The aircraft then crashed into the Caribbean Sea .
#Text=The passengers — seven of them local , two of them tourists from the Netherlands — managed to escape from the plane and were rescued by services in the area .
#Text=The impact of the crash caused the pilot and several passengers to lose consciousness , however the passengers managed to recover and escape , suffering only minor head injuries .
#Text=Two passengers tried to rescue the pilot as the plane was beginning to sink and Robert was still unconscious .
#Text=However , the crash had damaged the safety harness attached to the pilot , and the passengers were unable to free him .
#Text=They were left with no choice but to escape through the plane door when they noticed that it was beginning to sink .

#Text=The body of Mansell has yet to be found but the Foreign and Commonwealth Office has now confirmed that he died on Wednesday , with a spokesperson for them saying : " We are aware of the death of a British national in a plane crash near Curaçao . "
#Text=" He 's a hero , " said Simon Janzen from Divi Divi Air .
#Text=" All the passengers survived and he is the only one missing .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=Robert Mansell 's father Roger expressed his disapproval .

#Text= I am furious , " commented Roger .

column1: #Text=" If you have nine people on board and a plane is overloaded and a problem develops , it becomes much harder to fix . "
#Text=Roger said that Robert had repeatedly explained to him problems about overloading , as the weight of the luggage and the passengers was not checked properly .
#Text=Roger continued : " He was a wonderful son and a hero .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=In response to the allegations made , Germaine Richie who is the owner of Divi Divi Air , made a comment saying :  We reject any allegations that we are overloading planes and putting safety at risk . "
